choice: ^I'll come back later. Gotta do something first
outcome2: ^It feels a bit weird entering my own head. It feels like you're dreaming.
^Sometimes in there, I can choose to switch around. For example, I could be controlling my own "body" here. And on the other hand, I can choose to control my body outside.
^... On second thought, do you think people will find it work if someone is standing still with their eyes closed?
outcome2_1_1: ^Yeah... We need to find somewhere else next time we do this.
outcome_2_1_2: ^Yeah... We need to find somewhere else next time. But I wonder where?
outcome3: ^oh alright, see you. But please don't be gone for too long, it feels a bit weird staying here on my own.
